snippet.title: Gilligan's Gold - Amstrad CPC Gameplay (Steam Re-release)
snippet.description:
Originally released in 1984 for home computers, Gilligan's Gold saw players dodging bandits in a dangerous mine - trying to grab large bags of precious gold!

Climb ladders to reach new areas. Grab bags of gold and transport them to your wheelbarrow at the top of the screen. Watch out for the deadly bandits. The pickaxe can be used to mine through certain parts of the wall - hiding secret gold caches - or to stun an outlaw. Ride minecarts to zip through the mines.

The gameplay is from the Steam re-release from Pixel Games UK

Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2014750/Gilligans_Gold/

#steam #steamgame #steamgames #retrogames #retrogaming #pixelgamesuk #amstrad #amstradgaming #amstradcpc #amstradcpc464 #gilligansgold #ocean #oceansoftware
